actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 9 (2d4+4) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) acid damage.

actions.name: Acid Spit
actions.desc: _Ranged Weapon Attack:_ +6 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 11 (2d6+4) acid damage.

actions.name: Breath of Flinders (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The flinderbeast exhales splinters in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 DEX save, taking 18 (4d8) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

special_abilities.name: Fey Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The flinderbeast is resistant to the charmed and unconscious conditions.

special_abilities.name: Heightened Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The flinderbeast's Perception 18 when perceiving by hearing or smell.
